about_the_game:
PrisonersHunt is a game in which you become a Fulgeonix or a Chaenombrus.
Fulgeonix are disguised as objects around the map and blend into the environment. Fulgeonix try to hide from Chaenombrus and avoid death. The Chaenombrus win the round if all the Fulgeonix are killed, and the Fulgeonix win if time runs out or if they manage to escape the Chaenombrus.

the Fulgeonix are feared and elusive criminals. Made of pure energy, these beings have managed to escape from the world's most secure prisons. Thanks to their unique ability to transform into any object and temporarily manipulate their environment, they wreak havoc wherever they go.

Faced with this threat, the authorities have unleashed their secret weapons: the Chaenombrus. These implacable guardians, made of mystical chains and capable of rendering themselves invisible, are deployed to track down and capture the Fulgeonix, whatever the cost. The game becomes a merciless hunt through varied landscapes, where the survival of the Fulgeonix depends on their cunning and their ability to evade these fearsome predators.

Game mechanics:

Transformation and Camouflage: Fulgeonix can transform themselves into any object in their environment. Whether it's a simple chair, a security camera, or a vehicle, every transformation offers a chance to hide or distract the Chaenombrus.

Temporary Manipulation: Fulgeonix don't just transform; they can also Duplicate objects for a limited time. This enables them to create diversions, trigger traps, or even use devices against Chaenombrus.

Hunting and Evasion: Chaenombrus, with their ability to become invisible and detect Fulgeonix energy, are deadly hunters. Fulgeonix must constantly be on the move, using their environment to their advantage, and staying one step ahead to avoid capture.

Dynamic environments: Levels include urban areas, abandoned industrial complexes and natural landscapes. Each environment poses unique challenges, requiring the Fulgeonix to adapt quickly to evade the Chaenombrus.

Objectives:
Players playing as the Fulgeonix must escape from the Chaenombrus while completing secondary missions such as stealing resources, sabotaging infrastructure, or reaching extraction points to progress to increasingly difficult areas. The Chaenombru, meanwhile, must track down and capture all Fulgeonix before they can escape.

content_descriptors.notes:
Here's the development team's description of the product's content:

This game may include content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work: Generic adult content

name: Prisoners Hunt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx 3060 12GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fulgeonix criminals, made of pure energy, escape and sow chaos. Hunted by the Chaenombrus, guardians who can make themselves invisible, they must use their transformative powers to survive. In “Prisoners Hunt”, every escape is a fight for freedom.
